thread.section_title: NeverGroomed Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of NeverGroomed | nevergroomed.com
thread.title: KC

author: KC
title: KC
text: I have always rented skis but decided to buy my own this year. What I thought was going to be a daunting task became a breeze with Nevergroomed. Jason guided me through the process helping me select 2 sets of skis (piste and powder), bindings and poles. Payment and shipment was easy and efficient. The package also came with some free gifts which was a pleasant surprise. I will be using them again in the future and I am recommending to friends.
